channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Yoast SEO
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Yoast SEO

item.title: CVE-2021-25118|2024-08-03T19:56:10.582Z -- unknown -- yoast%20seo
item.description: The Yoast SEO WordPress plugin (from versions 16.7 until 17.2) discloses the full internal path of featured images in posts via the wp/v2/posts REST endpoints which could help an attacker identify other vulnerabilities or help during the exploitation of other identified vulnerabilities.

item.title: CVE-2021-24153|2024-08-03T19:21:18.410Z -- unknown -- yoast%20seo
item.description: A Stored Cross-Site Scripting vulnerability was discovered in the Yoast SEO WordPress plugin before 3.4.1, which had built-in blacklist filters which were blacklisting Parenthesis as well as several functions such as alert but bypasses were found.
